portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Projects, Publications and Research Papers
portfolio.description: My projects make use of vast variety of latest technology tools. My best experience is to create Web Applications and deploy them to web services. Here's a list of my favorite projects I have worked on.

projects.title: PHYLOViZ Web Platform
projects.subtitle: A Modular and Web-Based Tool for Phylogenetic Analysis
projects.description: PHYLOViZ Web Platform is a web platform, developed in the context of the PHYLOViZ initiative, that allows users to access and perform phylogenetic analyses from anywhere with an internet connection, without requiring installation of software or access to HPC resources. It's modular, making it maintainable and extensible. Supports large scale analyses by relying on a workflow system that enables the distribution of parallel computations on cloud and HPC environments.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me
about.description: I am a Computer Science and Engineering student, BSc (2023), MSc (in progress) at Instituto Superior T√©cnico, in Lisbon, Portugal. My academic journey reflects my deep passion for technology and software development. My research interests encompass distributed systems, web development, and cloud technologies. Beyond my academic pursuits, I find joy in travel, reading, playing guitar, and staying active through workouts.
